title: br88
author: br88
created_time: September 01, 2023, 03:07:34 PMLast edit: September 01, 2023, 03:26:05 PM by br88
content: Hello,I'm domain seller but this time I couldn't make a single sale and I'm broke.I've $90 balance in NameCheap.com which are good to purchase domains and hosting.But I need a fast cash, So I will purchase a domain from you for $60 on NameCheap if you can send $23 to me in Bitcoins.After $6 commission, You will have $54 on NameCheap. But since the $24 ($23 bitcoin + $1 domain) is your investment, Your profit is $30.You can use Paxful if you only have PayPal to send botcoins to me. Let's do it. Only for trusted members. We will do the transaction in two steps either.I'm grateful.[ FYI: There's an internet shutdown in my state, That's why I couldn't make a sale and wasted my money in the process to move to another state. https://www.zawya.com/en/economy/africa/ethiopia-internet-shutdown-in-amhara-region-as-clashes-surge-kbpyllre ] [ I'm not begging anyhow, I'm just telling my story so you guys could be able to do the deal with full information. Thank you very much. ]

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: br88 on September 01, 2023, 03:07:34 PMI've $90 balance in NameCheap.comWhere did this balance come from? If it's a stolen creditcard, it can come back to bite me if I take this deal.I think you should move this to "Digital goods".

comments.author: br88
comments.body: I can understand your concern, but as you can see the $36 is in my balance and the $55 is in the marketplace earnings - available for immediate use. I sell domains mainly via dan.com to get payments directly deposited in my local bank and for low sales, I use NameCheap.com own marketplace.https://ibb.co/d6TT9NB

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: br88 on September 02, 2023, 08:13:10 AMI can understand your concern, but as you can see the $36 is in my balance and the $55 is in the marketplace earnings - available for immediate use.Then why don't you click Withdraw?

comments.author: br88
comments.body: I can use my earnings to purchase domain and hosting in NameCheap but to withdraw it out of namecheap to paypal, it should be at least $100. I don't have paypal either.That's why i 'm looking for someone who wants $s in namecheap to use to register domains and buy hosting.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on September 02, 2023, 08:28:41 AMQuote from: br88 on September 02, 2023, 08:13:10 AMI can understand your concern, but as you can see the $36 is in my balance and the $55 is in the marketplace earnings - available for immediate use.Then why don't you click Withdraw?There's something phishing here and op should withdraw it from there, who else did he want to get it withdrawn? Maybe op want to outsmart himself and not people here because the whole story isn't clear to me at all, how did he want to sell something and the balance can not be withdrawn by him yet asking for someone to pay him through other payment method and again, he said of being broke how on earth can someone have 90$ in his namescheap account and complaining of being broke and want to sell it off. Or are mine getting the whole thing twisted here?
